snippet: The Boston Red Sox began rebuilding for their World Series title defense when they signed the free-agent catcher A. J. Pierzynski to a one-year contract.
abstract: Boston Red Sox sign free-agent catcher A J Pierzynski to one-year contract.
lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox began rebuilding for their World Series title defense when they signed the free-agent catcher A. J. Pierzynski to a one-year contract.
